tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: Contribution to the OAS programme  for landmine survivor assistance and economic reinsertion in Colombia
Contributo al programma di OSA per assistenza alle vittime da mine e reinserimento socio economico in Colombia
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: This project proposes to provide support to landmine survivors in the Republic of Colombia, in order to improve their quality of life, empower them to be fully reintegrated into their families and their communities. The principle activities supported will include assistance for physical and psychological rehabilitation of landmine victims and micro-financing of community development projects that assist reintegration of survivors into their communities.

Favorire una assistenza integrata per consolidare la riabilitazione fisica e psicologica a favore di superstiti e feriti da mine e/o altri ordigni esplosivi, nonché migliorare i processi di formazione, le opportunità educative e l’implementazione di microprogetti che rafforzino i processi di reinserimento sociale ed economico delle vittime all’interno delle comunità di appartenenza
